topic.title: Create New User
topic.section:
The Press Manager can use the Create New User link to register someone and assign them a role, from Press Manager to Reader. The user can, on logging in to the press, complete and change the profile information entered by the Press Manager.

Changing a password. Users can change their passwords once they have logged into the press. The Press Manager cannot access a password once it has been assigned. However, the system will generate a new password and email it to users who click on the "{translate key="user.login.forgotPassword"}" link under the login box.

Enroll Existing User
The Press Manager can assign an existing user to one or more new roles.

Sync Users
Enrollment synchronization will enroll all users enrolled in the specified role in the specified press into the same role in this press. This function allows a common set of users (e.g., Reviewers) to be synchronized between presses.
